alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 10:09PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Baca, east central Las Animas and southwestern Bent Counties through 1045 PM MDT... At 1009 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southeast of Higbee, or 25 miles southeast of North La Junta, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Baca, east central Las Animas and southwestern Bent Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
